- 1.3 Countermeasures

- Can be used to paint a long trail of ink in order to traverse when using a slower weapon.

- Really effective when used in long, thin corridors, as it will be much harder for opponents to avoid.

TBA

- The player can outrun it if they are in squid form, but this can be risky as opponents can surprise you if you rotate your camera.

- It is possible to jump over the Seeker.
